name: raneto
tagline: A markdown based knowledge base without database dependencies
description: Raneto is a self-hosted Markdown-powered knowledge base and documentation system. It supports search, categories, and page editing without a database.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write documentation in plain Markdown files for easy editing and version control

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Store all content as files on disk for simple backups and portability

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find information quickly across all documentation pages with built-in search

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Update documentation through the web interface without restarting the server

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Modify the appearance with CSS and templates to match your brand

features.title: User Management
features.description: Protect sensitive documentation with password authentication and user management
